name: Wish Want Wear
overview:
Wish Want Wear is the Lovefilm of designer dresses.

They rent designer dresses online, at a fraction of the retail price. This model has often been touted as the next big game changer in online retail.

Wish Want Wear hold dresses from designers like Temperley, Halston Heritage, Catherine Malandrino, Milly, TiBi, Sass & Bide, Badgley Mischka, Nicole Miller, David Meister and many other designers.

The process is very easy. The easy to follow links on their homepage lead to a beautiful catalogue of dresses, where one can filter by size, price, date available, sleeve length, body type and also colour. Click on a dress, and you get taken to a simple to use, but very classy product detail page with all the mandatory e-commerce features including close-up zoom.

You have the option to choose to rent for 4 days or even 8 days. They even send a back-up size for free.

A pre-paid envelope is included with the dress. All you have to do is put the dress(es) into the envelope and pop the package into the post box on the last day of the rental
